<desc><s>This is a white, ceramic mug filled with coffee.</s> <s>It's nice and hot.</s></desc>
<desc><s>It's a pair of black glasses with thin, rectangular frames.</s> <if cond="player.name === 'Kyra'"><s>These are your glasses.</s></if></desc>
<desc><s>It's a basic black bra.</s> <s>The tag says its size is 34D.</s></desc>
<desc><s>It's a short-sleeved, black dress shirt with a white collar.</s> <s>The buttons are on the left side of the shirt.</s></desc>

<desc><s>This white lab coat reaches just above the knees and is made of a sturdy fabric.</s> <s>It's pristine white, indicating it's either brand new or taken care of very well.</s> <s>It has two pockets on the front.</s> <s>In the right pocket, you find <il name="RIGHT POCKET"></il>.</s> <s>In the left pocket, you find <il name="LEFT POCKET"></il>.</s></desc>

<desc><s>It's a pair of straight-leg, black dress pants.</s> <s>They have a button, but no zipper.</s> <s>It has two pockets on the front.</s> <s>In the right pocket, you find <il name="RIGHT POCKET"><item>a MONOKUMA KEY</item></il>.</s> <s>In the left pocket, you find <il name="LEFT POCKET"></il>.</s></desc>
<desc><s>It's a pair of plain, black panties.</s></desc>
<desc><s>It's a pair of plain, white ankle socks.</s></desc>
<desc><s>It's a pair of black Mary Janes flats.</s> <s>They're a size 6.</s></desc>
<desc><s>This is a key with Monokuma's head at the end.</s> <if cond="player.name !== 'Monokuma'"><s>This probably unlocks every door in the whole killing game.</s></if></desc>
<desc><if cond="player.name === 'Vivian'"><s>These are your glasses.</s> <s>You can hardly see without them.</s></if> <s>These glasses are squarish in shape and have thick, black frames.</s></desc>
<desc><s>It's a long-sleeved, white dress shirt.</s> <s>The buttons are on the left side of the shirt, from the wearer's perspective.</s></desc>

<desc><s>It's a tailored black suit jacket with a thin waist and just one button on the left side, from the wearer's perspective.</s> <s>It has two pockets.</s> <s>In the right pocket, you find <il name="RIGHT POCKET"></il>.</s> <s>In the left pocket, you find <il name="LEFT POCKET"></il>.</s></desc>
<desc><s>This is a quiver to hold arrows for a bow or crossbow.</s> <s>It contains <il><item>a pair of WHITE JEANS</item></il>.</s></desc>

<desc><s>It's a pair of black trousers.</s> <s>There are two pockets.</s> <s>In the right pocket, you find <il name="RIGHT POCKET"></il>.</s> <s>In the left pocket, you find <il name="LEFT POCKET"></il>.</s></desc>
<desc><s>It's a plain, white pair of panties.</s></desc>
<desc><s>It's a pair of plain, white ankle socks.</s></desc>
<desc><s>It's a pair of black Mary Janes flats.</s></desc>

<desc><s>It's a plain pair of white jeans.</s> <s>It has four pockets in total.</s> <s>In the right pocket, you find <il name="RIGHT POCKET"><item>a PACK OF TOILET PAPER</item></il>.</s> <s>In the left pocket, you find <il name="LEFT POCKET"><item>a PACK OF TOILET PAPER</item></il>.</s> <s>In the right back pocket, you find <il name="RIGHT BACK POCKET"></il>.</s> <s>In the left back pocket, you find <il name="LEFT BACK POCKET"></il>.</s></desc>

<desc><s>It’s a plastic package for toilet paper rolls.</s> <s>It has Monokuma on it, in a clear rip-off of the Charmin commercials, where he’s wiping his butt with a long piece of toilet paper.</s> <s>You should call Charmin’s customer support to report plagiarism at 1-800-777-1410!</s> <s>The pack contains <il><item>12 HAMBURGER BUNS</item></il>.</s> <if cond="this.weight === 0"><s>The pack is empty.</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>It’s a plastic package for toilet paper rolls.</s> <s>It has Monokuma on it, in a clear rip-off of the Charmin commercials, where he’s wiping his butt with a long piece of toilet paper.</s> <s>You should call Charmin’s customer support to report plagiarism at 1-800-777-1410!</s> <s>The pack contains <il><item>a bottle of DETERGENT</item></il>.</s> <if cond="this.weight === 0"><s>The pack is empty.</s></if></desc>
<desc><s>It's a hamburger bun.</s> <s>You *could* eat this by itself, but why would you want to?</s></desc>
<desc><s>This is a bottle of detergent that you could use to wash dishes.</s> <if cond="this.uses < 5"><s>The bottle is less than half full.</s></if></desc>
